name: biomni-segment-cells-with-deep-learning
title: Biomni: Segment Cells With Deep Learning
description: Segment cells in microscopy images using deep learning models
content:
Overview

Performs state-of-the-art cell segmentation in microscopy images using deep learning neural networks, specifically Cellpose and other advanced machine learning models. These AI-powered tools achieve superior accuracy in separating touching or overlapping cells, handling diverse cell morphologies, and working across different imaging modalities without manual parameter tuning. Represents the cutting edge in automated microbial cell analysis.

Input Parameters

  • image_path (required): Path to the microscopy image (supports phase contrast, fluorescence, brightfield, and other modalities)
  • model_type (optional, default: 'cellpose'): Deep learning model selection - 'cellpose', 'stardist', or other available models
  • output_dir (optional, default: './output'): Directory for saving segmentation masks and analysis results

Biological Use Case

Advanced applications in microbiology research including:

  • Accurate segmentation of densely packed bacterial colonies
  • Single-cell tracking in time-lapse microscopy experiments
  • Morphological analysis of diverse bacterial species and morphotypes
  • Segmentation of cells in complex biological matrices
  • High-throughput phenotypic screening with minimal manual curation
  • Analysis of bacterial cells in biofilms and microcolonies
  • Multimodal imaging analysis (combining phase and fluorescence)

Output

Produces advanced segmentation results including:

  • Instance segmentation masks with individual cell labels
  • Cell contours and boundaries with sub-pixel accuracy
  • Segmentation confidence scores for quality assessment
  • Morphological measurements for each segmented cell
  • Cell tracking identifiers for time-series analysis
  • Visualization overlays showing segmentation quality
  • Comprehensive analysis report (deep_learning_segmentation_results.txt)

Category

microbiology
